## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G09150](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G09150)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATHY2, GUN3, HY2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 2, GENOMES UNCOUPLED 3, ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 2
- **Description:**   phytochromobilin:ferredoxin oxidoreductase, chloroplast / phytochromobilin synthase (HY2);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G09150.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G09150.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT3G09150.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G09150.2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT3G09150.3](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G09150.3)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT3G09150.4](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G09150.4)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS3368]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;angustifolia, apetala, pyrimidine requiring, erecta, long hypocotyl, glabra, brevipedicellus, eceriferum, transparent testa.
   - [CS68]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;elongated hypocotyl, green-yellow plant.
   - [gun3-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Express nuclear-encoded Lhcb and RbcS  transcripts in the absence of chloroplast development.
   - [gun3-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Long hypocotyl phenotypes under white light.
